templates.title: Tailscale
templates.name: tailscale
templates.description: Zero config VPN. Installs on any device in minutes, manages firewall rules for you, and works from anywhere.
templates.note: The easiest, most secure way to use WireGuard and 2FA.

env.name: TS_SERVE_CONFIG
env.label: TS_SERVE_CONFIG
env.description: Path to serve configuration file for persistent drive shares (file will be created if it doesn't exist)

env.name: TS_AUTH_ONCE
env.label: TS_AUTH_ONCE
env.description: Only authenticate once, then reuse credentials

env.name: TS_AUTHKEY
env.label: TS_AUTHKEY
env.description: Tailscale authentication key (get from admin console)

env.name: TS_EXTRA_ARGS
env.label: TS_EXTRA_ARGS
env.description: Extra arguments to pass to 'tailscale up'
